[http://www.shacknews.com/article/73551/ccp-gives-blessing-to-eve-online-economy-attack](http://www.shacknews.com/article/73551/ccp-gives-blessing-to-eve-online-economy-attack)

A player organized a fleet of 14,000 ships to attack the central hub of Eve Online\'s economy.

What did CCP do? Re-did the servers so the game doesn\'t crash, they allow this, which is awesome.

The attack was planned for a couple of months.

This is pretty late. But it was glorious. Goonswarm extracted many carebear tears that day. I believe right now they\'re trying to attack anyone who mines in higsec. So just a heads up.

btw, just before any more assumptions are made, I am not with Goonswarm, I just find their actions hilarious.
This was all Jeb\'s idea. MOAR BOOSTERS!!
